title: Earthquake
creator_credit: Film Associates and University of California, Los Angeles
brief_description: Uses animation to demonstrate how an earthquake takes place. Shows the effects of earthquakes on landforms and on man-made structures. Explains how scientists learn more about earthquakes by studying the vibrations produced. Suitable for secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Associates and University of California, Los Angeles
